tr_quotes.quote: Sesinizi bulun ve başkalarına kendi seslerini bulmaları için ilham verin
tr_quotes.author: Stephen Covey

tr_quotes.quote: İlhamınızı yüksek, beklentilerinizi orta, ihtiyaçlarınızı az tutun.
tr_quotes.author: William Howard Stein

tr_quotes.quote: Arzunuz, duanızdır. Arzunuzun yerine getirildiğini şimdi hayal edin ve onun gerçekliğini hissedin; cevaplanan sevinci yaşayacaksınız.
tr_quotes.author: Joseph Murphy

tr_quotes.quote: Ulu çamlar fırtınalı diyarlarda yetişir.
tr_quotes.author: Cemil Meriç

tr_quotes.quote: Kendi omzuna tırman. Başka nasıl yükselebilirsin ki!
tr_quotes.author: Nietzche

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kadar yaparsan o kadar olursun.
tr_quotes.author: Angie Papadakis

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatımız limitli ama yapabileceklerimiz limitsizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Chuang Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Ya bir yol bul, ya bir yol aç, ya da yoldan çekil.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyüs

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şey yapmamak, yapılanların en yaygın olanıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Jerry Brown

tr_quotes.quote: Rüyaları gerçekleştirmenin en kısa yolu uyanmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada tutku olmaksızın başarılmış hiçbir büyük şey yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Hegel

tr_quotes.quote: İyi düşünmek iyidir; iyi hareket etmek çok iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Horace Mann

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç kimse başarı merdivenine elleri cebinde tırmanmamıştır.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyüs

tr_quotes.quote: Yaptıklarımız bizi oluşturur, biz de yaptıklarımızı.
tr_quotes.author: George Eliot

tr_quotes.quote: Zor bir işi geciktirmek onu imkânsız bir işe dönüştürür.
tr_quotes.author: George H. Lorimer

tr_quotes.quote: Bütün görkem başlamaya cürret edebilmektedir.
tr_quotes.author: Eugene F. Ware

tr_quotes.quote: Pratiğe dönüştürülen büyük düşünceler, büyük işler anlamına gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Hazlitt

tr_quotes.quote: Eylemler, teorilerin çözemeyeceği şüpheleri silecektir
tr_quotes.author: Tehyi Hsieh

tr_quotes.quote: Yapamazlara kulak asarsanız hiçbir zaman yapamazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: David Lloyd George

tr_quotes.quote: Daha iyi olmaya çalışmayan iyi olarak da kalamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Oliver Cromwell

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer ilk defasında başaramadıysanız ortalamaya yaklaşıyorsunuz demektir.
tr_quotes.author: M. H. Alderson

tr_quotes.quote: İşini erteleyen insan, işinin hiçbir zaman yapılmaması riskine giren insandır.
tr_quotes.author: Baudelaire

tr_quotes.quote: Elmas nasıl yontulmadan mükemmelleşmezse, insan da acı çekmeden olgunlaşmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyüs

tr_quotes.quote: Akıllı adam, aklını kullanır. Daha akıllı adam, başkalarının aklını da kullanır.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatın arenasında onurlar ve ödüller yaptıkları ile kendilerini gösterenlerin elindedir.
tr_quotes.author: Aristotle

tr_quotes.quote: İşlemeyen demiri kendi pası mahveder. İnsanı tembelliğe alışması mahveder.
tr_quotes.author: Hint Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar ancak hayalleriyle yaşar ve biraz yaşamaya başlayınca tüm hayallerini kaybederler.
tr_quotes.author: Voltiere

tr_quotes.quote: Kaplumbağaya dikkat et! Ancak kafasını çıkarıp risk aldığında ilerleyebilir
tr_quotes.author: James B. Conant

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarından üstün olmanız önemli değildir. Önemli olan dünkü halinizden üstün olmanızdır.
tr_quotes.author: Hint Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Bu senin yolun yalnızca, başkaları seninle yürüyebilir, fakat hiç kimse senin yürümez.
tr_quotes.author: Rumi

tr_quotes.quote: Başarılı kuruluşların keşfettiği gizli formül, müşterilere misafir ve çalışanlara insan gibi davranmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Tom Peters

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı, her şeye hazırlıklı olmaktır ve hazırlıklı olmadığınızda başarısızlık kaçınılmazdır.
tr_quotes.author: Confucius

tr_quotes.quote: Sadece kendimiz için yaptıklarımız bizimle ölür; başkaları ve dünya için yaptığımız şey kalır ve ölümsüzdür.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Pike

tr_quotes.quote: Büyümeyi bırakan insanlar başkalarına ilham veremez. Liderlik kendini zorlamakla başlar.
tr_quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizin en iyi versiyonunu yaşarken, başkalarına kendilerinin en iyi versiyonlarını yaşamaları için ilham verirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarına ilham vermek ve onları aydınlatmak için karanlıkta ışık olun.
tr_quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

tr_quotes.quote: Demir demiri keskinleştirdiğinden, bir arkadaş bir arkadaşını keskinleştirir.
tr_quotes.author: Kral Solomon

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarına hizmet etmek ve başkalarına ilham vermeye çalışmak bir seçenek değil, bir sorumluluktur.
tr_quotes.author: Bill Courtney

tr_quotes.quote: Hareketleriniz başkalarına daha fazla hayal kurmaları, daha fazla bilgi edinmeleri, daha fazla şey yapmaları ve daha fazla olmaları için ilham verirse, bir lidersiniz.
tr_quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

tr_quotes.quote: İyi eylemler kendimize güç verir ve başkalarında iyi eylemlere ilham verir.
tr_quotes.author: Platon

tr_quotes.quote: Başarınız bir umut ışığı olarak parlayacak ve toplayamayacağınız sayılara ilham verecektir.
tr_quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

tr_quotes.quote: Şefimizin istediği, olabileceğimizi bildiğimiz şey olmak için bize ilham verecek biridir.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatınız dünyaya ilham veren bir mesajdır.
tr_quotes.author: Maeve Garriosn

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarına hizmet etmek ve başkalarına ilham vermeye çalışmak bir seçenek değil, bir sorumluluktur.
tr_quotes.author: Bill Courtney

tr_quotes.quote: İlham almak harika, ama ilham vermek bir onur.
tr_quotes.author: Stacey T. Avı

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarına onlara ilham veren şeyi yapma konusunda ilham vermek için bana ilham veren şeyi yapmak benim sorumluluğumdur.
tr_quotes.author: Tsepiso Makhubedu

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sev. Nazik, kibar, saygılı, samimi olun. Bunu yaparsanız, başkalarına bu tavırla ilham verebilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Kemmy Nola

tr_quotes.quote: Almak için verme. Vermek için başkalarına ilham vermek için ver.
tr_quotes.author: Simon Sinek

tr_quotes.quote: Bu güne değecek olan şey, başkalarına gelecekteki bir zamanda harekete geçmeleri için ilham verir.
tr_quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarına ilham verecek olursanız, önce kendinizdeki adamı bulun.
tr_quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

en_quotes.quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible
en_quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

en_quotes.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

en_quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination
en_quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

en_quotes.quote: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you
en_quotes.author: Unknown

en_quotes.quote: A single sunbeam is enough to drive away many shadows
en_quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

en_quotes.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted
en_quotes.author: Aesop

en_quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world
en_quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

en_quotes.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood and I - I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have
en_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

en_quotes.quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls
en_quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

en_quotes.quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it
en_quotes.author: Edith Wharton

en_quotes.quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do
en_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door
en_quotes.author: Milton Berle

en_quotes.quote: Hope is but the dream of those who wake
en_quotes.author: Matthew Prior

en_quotes.quote: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants
en_quotes.author: Isaac Newton

en_quotes.quote: It is only in sorrow bad weather masters us; in joy we face the storm and defy it
en_quotes.author: Amelia Barr

en_quotes.quote: Tears of joy are like the summer rain drops pierced by sunbeams
en_quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

en_quotes.quote: What we think, we become
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: God always gives His best to those who leave the choice with him
en_quotes.author: Jim Elliot

en_quotes.quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul
en_quotes.author: Democritus

en_quotes.quote: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome
en_quotes.author: Michael Jordan

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing impossible to him who will try
en_quotes.author: Alexander the Great

en_quotes.quote: A champion is someone who gets up when he can't
en_quotes.author: Jack Dempsey

en_quotes.quote: I have looked into your eyes with my eyes. I have put my heart near your heart
en_quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

en_quotes.quote: Shoot for the moon and if you miss you will still be among the stars
en_quotes.author: Les Brown

en_quotes.quote: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible
en_quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

en_quotes.quote: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: The limits of the possible can only be defined by going beyond them into the impossible
en_quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

en_quotes.quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality
en_quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

en_quotes.quote: If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine
en_quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: Out of difficulties grow miracles
en_quotes.author: Jean de la Bruyere

en_quotes.quote: What great thing would you attempt if you knew you could not fail?
en_quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

en_quotes.quote: If the doors of perception were cleansed everything would appear to man as it is, infinite
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: The things that we love tell us what we are
en_quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

en_quotes.quote: The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!
en_quotes.author: John Muir

en_quotes.quote: Everyone here has the sense that right now is one of those moments when we are influencing the future
en_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

en_quotes.quote: Love the moment and the energy of that moment will spread beyond all boundaries
en_quotes.author: Corita Kent

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing stronger in the world than gentleness
en_quotes.author: Han Suyin

en_quotes.quote: With self-discipline most anything is possible
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is the natural flower of duty
en_quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

en_quotes.quote: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value
en_quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

en_quotes.quote: The authentic self is the soul made visible
en_quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

en_quotes.quote: Joy descends gently upon us like the evening dew, and does not patter down like a hailstorm
en_quotes.author: Jean Paul

en_quotes.quote: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: Ah, but a man's reach should exceed his grasp, Or what's a heaven for?
en_quotes.author: Robert Browning

en_quotes.quote: Give light and people will find the way
en_quotes.author: Ella Baker

en_quotes.quote: Vitality shows in not only the ability to persist but the ability to start over
en_quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

en_quotes.quote: I dwell in possibility
en_quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: One today is worth two tomorrows
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: Light tomorrow with today!
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

en_quotes.quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality
en_quotes.author: Plutarch

en_quotes.quote: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too
en_quotes.author: Anne Frank

en_quotes.quote: I am not afraid of tomorrow, for I have seen yesterday and I love today!
en_quotes.author: William Allen White

en_quotes.quote: What makes the desert beautiful is that somewhere it hides a well
en_quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

en_quotes.quote: I believe that if one always looked at the skies, one would end up with wings
en_quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

en_quotes.quote: Memories of our lives, of our works and our deeds will continue in others
en_quotes.author: Rosa Parks

en_quotes.quote: Nurture your minds with great thoughts. To believe in the heroic makes heroes
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: It is always the simple that produces the marvelous
en_quotes.author: Amelia Barr

en_quotes.quote: If you could only love enough, you could be the most powerful person in the world
en_quotes.author: Emmet Fox

en_quotes.quote: It's inspirational to see someone who is dying smile
en_quotes.author: Arlen Specter

en_quotes.quote: Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul
en_quotes.author: Thomas Merton

en_quotes.quote: Each day provides its own gifts
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself
en_quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

en_quotes.quote: From a small seed a mighty trunk may grow
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish
en_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is worth more than this day
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Enthusiasm moves the world
en_quotes.author: Arthur Balfour

en_quotes.quote: The only journey is the one within
en_quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

en_quotes.quote: I am so fresh in soul and spirit that life gushes and bubbles around me in a thousand springs
en_quotes.author: Robert Schumann

en_quotes.quote: A #2 pencil and a dream can take you anywhere
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Reach for it. Push yourself as far as you can
en_quotes.author: Christa McAuliffe

en_quotes.quote: When deeds speak, words are nothing
en_quotes.author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon

en_quotes.quote: We convince by our presence
en_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

en_quotes.quote: Reach for the stars
en_quotes.author: Christa McAuliffe

en_quotes.quote: I celebrate myself, and sing myself
en_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

en_quotes.quote: Grace is the beauty of form under the influence of freedom
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

en_quotes.quote: As people are walking all the time, in the same spot, a path appears
en_quotes.author: John Locke

en_quotes.quote: Love and desire are the spirit's wings to great deeds
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Try to be like the turtle - at ease in your own shell
en_quotes.author: Bill Copeland

en_quotes.quote: Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Look within. Within is the fountain of good, and it will ever bubble up, if thou wilt ever dig
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: God sleeps in the minerals, awakens in plants, walks in animals, and thinks in man
en_quotes.author: Arthur Young

en_quotes.quote: Every charitable act is a stepping stone toward heaven
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: Without craftsmanship, inspiration is a mere reed shaken in the wind
en_quotes.author: Johannes Brahms

en_quotes.quote: Silence is the last thing the world will ever hear from me
en_quotes.author: Marlee Matlin

en_quotes.quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: You don't look out there for God, something in the sky, you look in you
en_quotes.author: Alan Watts

en_quotes.quote: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I can accomplish
en_quotes.author: Michelangelo

en_quotes.quote: A place for everything, everything in its place
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: I love those who yearn for the impossible
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: What we need is more people who specialize in the impossible
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

en_quotes.quote: Courage, my friends; 'tis not too late to build a better world
en_quotes.author: Tommy Douglas

en_quotes.quote: Men must live and create. Live to the point of tears
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: Belief creates the actual fact
en_quotes.author: William James

en_quotes.quote: Of all things visible, the highest is the heaven of the fixed stars
en_quotes.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

en_quotes.quote: Your heart is full of fertile seeds, waiting to sprout
en_quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

en_quotes.quote: Great hopes make great men
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: A compliment is something like a kiss through a veil
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Every story I create, creates me. I write to create myself
en_quotes.author: Octavia E. Butler

en_quotes.quote: The handicap of deafness is not in the ear; it is in the mind
en_quotes.author: Marlee Matlin

en_quotes.quote: From its brilliancy everything is illuminated
en_quotes.author: Guru Nanak

en_quotes.quote: Not on one strand are all life's jewels strung
en_quotes.author: William Morris

en_quotes.quote: Of all human activities, man's listening to God is the supreme act of his reasoning and will
en_quotes.author: Pope Paul VI

en_quotes.quote: For a gallant spirit there can never be defeat
en_quotes.author: Wallis Simpson

en_quotes.quote: There are glimpses of heaven to us in every act, or thought, or word, that raises us above ourselves
en_quotes.author: Robert Quillen

en_quotes.quote: Think with your whole body
en_quotes.author: Taisen Deshimaru

en_quotes.quote: Today is the only day. Yesterday is gone
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself
en_quotes.author: Andre Gide

en_quotes.quote: Thought is the wind, knowledge the sail, and mankind the vessel
en_quotes.author: Augustus Hare

en_quotes.quote: Noble deeds that are concealed are most esteemed
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: Hope is some extraordinary spiritual grace that God gives us to control our fears, not to oust them
en_quotes.author: Vincent McNabb

en_quotes.quote: I believe in living today. Not in yesterday, nor in tomorrow
en_quotes.author: Loretta Young

en_quotes.quote: I arise full of eagerness and energy, knowing well what achievement lies ahead of me
en_quotes.author: Zane Grey

en_quotes.quote: Tears are often the telescope by which men see far into heaven
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: If the world seems cold to you, kindle fires to warm it
en_quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

en_quotes.quote: God loves to help him who strives to help himself
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: I said to the almond tree, 'Friend, speak to me of God,' and the almond tree blossomed
en_quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

en_quotes.quote: My mind's my kingdom
en_quotes.author: Francis Quarles

en_quotes.quote: The meaning I picked, the one that changed my life: Overcome fear, behold wonder
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: The most beautiful thing in the world is, of course, the world itself
en_quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

en_quotes.quote: Countless as the sands of the sea are human passions
en_quotes.author: Nikolai Gogol

en_quotes.quote: The Wright brothers flew right through the smoke screen of impossibility
en_quotes.author: Charles Kettering

en_quotes.quote: Faith is love taking the form of aspiration
en_quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

en_quotes.quote: Too low they build, who build beneath the stars
en_quotes.author: Edward Young

en_quotes.quote: Whatever ought to be, can be
en_quotes.author: James Rouse

en_quotes.quote: Ideas shape the course of history
en_quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

en_quotes.quote: Mankind is made great or little by its own will
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

en_quotes.quote: Act like you expect to get into the end zone
en_quotes.author: Christopher Morley

en_quotes.quote: Plant thy foot firmly in the prints which His foot has made before thee
en_quotes.author: Joseph Barber Lightfoot

en_quotes.quote: It is by acts and not by ideas that people live
en_quotes.author: Anatole France

en_quotes.quote: Create each day anew
en_quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

en_quotes.quote: We are here to make another world
en_quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

en_quotes.quote: The truth is on the march and nothing will stop it
en_quotes.author: Emile Zola

en_quotes.quote: And when I breathed, my breath was lightning
en_quotes.author: Black Elk

en_quotes.quote: Can a person be inspirational? Does a person have global sensibility? That's the hardest thing to find
en_quotes.author: Anand Mahindra

en_quotes.quote: Nothing makes one feel so strong as a call for help
en_quotes.author: Pope Paul VI

en_quotes.quote: Let each man exercise the art he knows
en_quotes.author: Aristophanes

en_quotes.quote: It's a moment that I'm after, a fleeting moment, but not a frozen moment
en_quotes.author: Andrew Wyeth

en_quotes.quote: The ideal life is in our blood and never will be still
en_quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

en_quotes.quote: Our ideals are our better selves
en_quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott
